A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Honestly my Kids loved it\, I really didn't care for the special effects in some areas with the ships looked bad and poor physics with gravity in space.  The really young actor as a fighter pilot was unrealistic\, Luke just wasn't the Luke I would have expected\, boring.  None of the characters backgrounds were even developed.  Overall a teen action flick worth forgetting.  Holding my breath for the last installment.
